title: Ascension: The Ballad of Darane: Book 3
description: Darkness spreads. A new order is established across the lands.The teachings of Aerokin talk of evil which will infect and consume everything it touches - and of a woman with the power to save or condemn all.The Ballad of Darane chronicles the journey of a woman with a destiny and power she does not understand or want, as she struggles to cope with the brutality of the world she inhabits.Ascension is the third book in the Ballad of Darane series.
author: Tir Cey
